name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time Well Spent â€” See prices in hours

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace all prices with time based on your hourly wage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces prices on all shopping websites (Amazon, eBay, Target, etc...) with how many hours you would have to spend working to make enough money to pay that price. This is calculated based on your hourly wage after state and federal taxes. (Idea Credit: Aaron Z. Lewis)
